drug_incl_remarks: Mecillinam (uncomplicated UTI only) E. coli, Klebsiella spp. (except K. aerogenes), Raoultella spp. and  P. mirabilis
Cefuroxime ivHE, E. coli, Klebsiella spp. (except K. aerogenes), Raoultella spp. and P. mirabilis
Cefuroxime oral (uncomplicated UTI only), E. coli, Klebsiella spp. (except K. aerogenes), Raoultella spp. and  P. mirabilis
Imipenem, Morganella morganii,Proteus spp. and Providencia spp.2
Ceftaroline, S. aureus (indications other than pneumonia)
Nitrofurantoin (uncomplicated UTI only),  S. agalactiae (group B streptococci)
Trimethoprim (uncomplicated UTI only), S. agalactiae (group B streptococci)
